name: Zork Remake Demo
detailed_description:
This Australian Indie studio is committed to converting the old Infocom text adventures to 3d first person adventures. Zork 1 Remake is the first of these to be developed. These infocom remakes are practically exactly the same as the originals. Contact - arielloveemail@yahoo.com

Instructions for playing the free pre-release demo -
WASD - move
Mouse - look around
Left click - interact
Right click - inventory / save / load / quit

Objects to find in the demo - 8
Things to do in the demo - 3

short_description: This Australian Indie studio is committed to converting the old Infocom text adventures to 3d first person adventures. Zork 1 Remake is the first of these to be developed. These infocom remakes are practically exactly the same as the originals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon R9 290X (3 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon R9 290X (3 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
